params.name: data

params.name: data.policy
params.description: Required. A new or updated [policy][google.cloud.binaryauthorization.v1beta1.Policy] value. The service will overwrite the [policy name][google.cloud.binaryauthorization.v1beta1.Policy.name] field with the resource name in the request URL, in the format projects/*/policy.
